text: Nina Menkova (born 25 December 1945) is a Russian equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Russian female equestrians Category:Soviet female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the Soviet Union Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Yekaterinburg
title: Nina Menkova
